extracted_entities.name: 6th Summer School on Empirical Research Methods in Software Engineering and Informatics (ERMSEI)

details.location: Centre de recherche INRIA/ IRISA, Rennes, France
details.goal: To get junior researchers started on using empirical research methods on software engineering topics.
details.focus: Practical, hands-on exercises and overview of major research methods.
speakers: Djamel E. Khelladi, CNRS, Univ. Rennes, France
details.prerequisites: No specific prerequisites mentioned, but targeted at junior researchers seeking support.

details.submission_info: To contribute to SEWORLD, send your submission to mailto:[log in to unmask]
details.more_information: http://sigsoft.org/resources/seworld.html provides more information on SEWORLD as well as links to a complete archive of messages posted to the list.
